details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Elex in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/arm-cannon-mastery.png} tip={Arm Cannon Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/arm-cannon-booster.png} tip={Arm Cannon Boost}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/charge-mastery.png} tip={Charge Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon-plus.png} tip={Revolving Cannon Plus}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bobbing.png} tip={Bobbing}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/combo-training.png} tip={Combo Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/shield-training.png} tip={Shield Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon-plus-ii.png} tip={Revolving Cannon Plus II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/rocket-rush.png} tip={Rocket Rush}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-cannon.png} tip={Magnum Cannon}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving}>

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
Some players may not put SP into to gain better control of other mobility skills

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Aftershock Punch, Power Punch, Piercing Punch
  • Improved Bunker Explosion
  • / Bunker Buster Explosion - Guard Bonus OR Speedy Vitality Shield

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Gauge and Combo Mechanics
extraContent.content:
Referenced from Repentant

Ammo Resource:

A resource required to use Revolving Cannon (1st Job), Detonate (1st Job), and Magnum Cannon (3rd Job). Once your Ammo resource is depleted, you will need to reload which is done automatically when your Ammo is empty

Dynamo Gauge:

This resource is exclusively used to activate Bunker Buster Explosion. You gain one Dynamo Gauge bar whenever you use Revolving Cannon. Once is used, you enter an Overheat state where your gauge is set to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use

Charge Skills:

Skills with a 'C' on the Skill Icon are Charge Skills. These skills can be held and charged while using other skills. When fully charged, releasing these Charge Skills while using other skills will cancel that skill and instead activate the Charge Skill and create an additional shockwave attack. This is used for Animation Canceling There are four Charge Skills:

  • Bobbing [2nd Job]
  • Weaving [3rd Job]
  • Hammer Smash [3rd Job]
  • Hyper Magnum Punch [Hyper Skill]

Bobbing and Weaving are your main Charge Skills that are used mainly for Animation Canceling. Although, they cannot cancel all skills like Ballistic Hurricane's uppercut, Bullet Blast's rush, and Decent Skill buffs While charging, attacks won't knock you back. You can hold up to 2 Charge skills at once. The charging animation is invisible and an orange aura will surround your character when the Charge skill is ready

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Turn invisible preventing touch damage

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/16/End_of_Special_Training} title={"End of Special Training"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Magnum Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 3.\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using Magnum Punch and will additionally attack the same number of enemies for 60% damage 4 times.
primary.desc: Punches forward
details: When casting, automatically uses <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}>

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> Double Blast (2nd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Revolving Cannon
primary.shortDesc: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill
primary.desc: Consumes 1 Ammo to create an additional explosive attack when used with the skills listed below
details: Automatically used when casting <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}>
Can be used manually during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-blast.png} tip={Revolving Blast (4th Job)}>
Holding down the Skill Key will manually reload your Ammo
Charges your Dynamo Gauge by 1

primary.name: Bunker Buster Explosion
primary.shortDesc: Requires 3 or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to 10 enemies for 100% damage 8 times. Melee hits ignore 80% of enemy Defense Rate.\nReleases Shockwave 1, attacking up to 10 enemies for 50% damage 6 times.\nAfter use, you will Overheat for 7 sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion. On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.
primary.desc: Depletes all of your Dynamo Gauge to release a massive explosion
details: Requires 3 or more Dynamo Guage bars to use
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

After using, you will Overheat briefly which sets your Dynamax Gauge to max but you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Detonate
primary.shortDesc: Ammo Cost: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Consumes 1 Ammo to fire your cannon recoiling you backward
details: While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together will propel you upward
Skill cannot be used while reloading
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Blast Shield
primary.shortDesc: When hit, converts 30% of your damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates every 5 second. The maximum strength of the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nKnockback Resistance increases by 100% while using Blaster skills.\nPermanently increases Knockback Resistance by 40%, DEF by 200, and Max HP by 20%.
primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance, %Max HP and grants flat DEF
Additionally, when using Blaster skills, you gain 100% Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Type Skill] Direct attacks from the Arm Cannon trigger additional attacks which deal 120% on up to 6 enemies 1 times.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by 30, Jump Power by 15, and Max Movement Speed by 20.
primary.desc: Successful Arm Cannon skill attacks trigger an additional attack
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed

primary.name: Double Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 4.\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using Double Blast and will additionally attack the same number of enemies for 100% damage 4 times.
primary.desc: Performs two punches in front of you
details: Pressing <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> twice will also trigger this skill
When casting, automatically uses <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}>

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bobbing.png} tip={Bobbing (2nd Job)}> Bobbing (2nd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving (3rd Job)}> Weaving (3rd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash (3rd Job)}/> Hammer Smash (3rd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/shotgun-punch.png} tip={Shotgun Punch (4th Job)}> Shotgun Punch (4th Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Bobbing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Bonus Avoidability 35% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\n[Passive Effect - Magnum Punch damage +100% points]
primary.desc: Dashes forward while avoiding enemy attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
Gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
Jumping will cancel the dash
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF for pressing the Skill Key again to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward

primary.name: Arm Cannon Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Duration: 200 sec, Weapon Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Arm Cannon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery +50%, Critical Rate +30%, Attack Power +20, Final Damage: +5%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Charge Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by 15%. Using a charge skill reloads 1 Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nAt the start of charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by 20%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently increases damage by 15%.
primary.desc: Decreases the charge time required for all Charge Skills (marked by a 'C' on icon)
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage
Using a Charge Skill will also reload your Ammo by 1 immediately but will not interrupt auto-reload
After using any Charge Skill, you will briefly gain increased %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks)

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +20% points, Shockwave 1 damage +40% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +32% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +40% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 4 bars, maximum number of Ammo increased to 4.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 4 bars or higher increases damage by 40% points and will generate Shockwave 2, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 100% damage 6 times.
primary.desc: Increases the %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}>, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon-mastery.png} tip={Revolving Cannon Mastery (1st Job)}>, and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}>
details: Additionally increases the capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge<bp_Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> at 4 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack_>

primary.name: Hammer Smash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 200%. Attacks 6 times. Applies Debuff on Hit: for 30 seconds, Final Damage taken from Blaster's attack +10%.\nWhen releasing charge, creates a shockwave that lasts for 5 sec and hits up to 8 enemies for 150% damage 2 times. Enemies struck by the shockwave will be afflicted by the Final Damage debuff.\nDouble Blast Damage +130% points.
primary.desc: Strikes the ground creating a damaging shockwave around you that debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemies take increased %Final Damage from Blaster
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
While charging, enemy attacks will not knock you back
Shockwave is not affected by Damage Reflect

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> Magnum Punch (1st Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Weaving
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Bonus Avoidability 35% applied for 1.5 sec after activation.\n[Passive Effect - Magnum Punch damage +130% points]
primary.desc: Dashes backward while avoiding enemy attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> by a flat amount
You gain increased %Avoidability after dashing
You can jump to cancel the dash
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF for pressing the Skill Key again to cancel the dash
If activated after charging (pressing down), any skill that was already activated will be immediately canceled and you will dash forward

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/rocket-rush.png} tip={Rocket Rush (3rd Job)}> Rocket Rush (3rd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/muzzle-flash.png} tip={Muzzle Flash (3rd Job)}> Muzzle Flash (3rd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Rocket Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 28, Damage: 100%, Number of Enemies: 1. If there are enemies in the skill's path, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +20%
primary.desc: Grab a nearby enemy and dashes forward along with them damaging enemies in your path
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Magnum Cannon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Consumed Bullets: 1\nMax Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 4, Damage Against Normal Monsters: +20%\nCooldown: 4 sec.
primary.desc: Consumes 1 Ammo to fire a giant bullet forward damaging enemies it passes through
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus II
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +60% points, Shockwave 1 damage +80% points, and Shockwave 2 damage +40% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +96% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +60% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +20% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 5 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 5.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 5 slots or higher increases its damage by 80% points and will generate Shockwave 3, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 180% damage 6 times.
details: Increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}>, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon-mastery.png} tip={Revolving Cannon Mastery (1st Job)}>, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}>, and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}>

Capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge is increased once more<bp_Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> at 5 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack_>

primary.name: Shield Training
primary.shortDesc: When hit, convert 40% of damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%.
primary.desc: When hit, you convert a portion of the damage taken into a shield that slowly disappears
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Combo Training
primary.shortDesc: Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration: 30 sec. Final Damage increased by 3% per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every 6 stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every 10 stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by 15%
primary.desc: Whenever you link two skills, you gain a stacking buff of %Final Damage (up to 10 stacks)
details: Every 6 stacks, you gain increased Attack Speed (by 1 stage)
Every 10 stacks, increased Link Speed between linking skills
Additionally, permanently increases %Attack

primary.name: Shotgun Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 70, Max Number of Enemies: 6, Damage: 265%, Number of Attacks: 6, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +85%, then generates a shockwave\nShockwave: attacks up to 6 enemies for 140% damage 4 times, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +350%p\nIncreases Double Blast damage by 180% points.
primary.desc: Punches forward creating a powerful blast that creates a shockwave
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> by a flat amount
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters<bp_The shockwave attack will only deal increased %Damage by a flat amount_>

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bobbing.png} tip={Bobbing (2nd Job)}> Bobbing (2nd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving (3rd Job)}> Weaving (3rd Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Muzzle Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP cost: 25, Damage: 500%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3\nMagnum Punch damage +216% points
primary.desc: Instantly dashes to a nearby enemy while using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving (3rd Job)}>
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}>

Can only be used during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving (3rd Job)}><bp_Pressing <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/weaving.png} tip={Weaving (3rd Job)}> while dashing will activate Muzzle Flash_>
Will not activate if there are no enemies in range

Attack can be linked with:<bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> Magnum Punch (1st Job)_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bullet-blast.png} tip={Bullet Blast (5th Job)}> Bullet Blast (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Ballistic Hurricane
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1250%, Number of Attacks: 5
Combo Training is at max stacks when attack succeeds, Duration: 12 sec
Cooldown: 15 sec
[Passive Effect - Hammer Smash Damage (aside from Shock Wave): +195% points]
primary.desc: Releases a cyclone wave forward
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount
Upon successful hit, grants max stacks of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/combo-training.png} tip={Combo Training (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Revolving Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Rushes and grabs enemies for 230% damage. Stuns. Hits 2 times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to 10 more enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits 4 time(s) for 200%, 220%, 240%, 260%, 280%, or 300% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals 350% damage 8 times and ignores additional 80% Defense Rate.\nCooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Dashes to the enemy with the highest Max HP while grabbing and binding them
details: When used, fully reloads your Ammo
While grabbing the enemy, you are invincible but immobile
Consumes all of your Dynamo Gauge

Can use <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> while attacking to create a series of explosions<bp_After using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> 6 times, you can cast <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> that deals increased %Damage_>

primary.name: Vitality Shield
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and 50% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for 15 sec.\nKnockback attack of Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon damage increased by 100% points.\nCooldown: 200 sec.
primary.desc: Converts your active <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/blast-shield.png} tip={Blast Shield (1st Job)}> into HP
details: Cannot be used if there is no <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/blast-shield.png} tip={Blast Shield (1st Job)}> or if your HP is full

After casting, you take reduced damage, including %Max HP damage<bp_Amount reduced is based on <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/advanced-charge-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Charge Mastery (4th Job)}> (-35%)_>

[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/rocket-rush.png} tip={Rocket Rush (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-cannon.png} tip={Magnum Cannon (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Revolving Cannon Plus III
primary.shortDesc:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +160% points, Shockwave 1 damage +225% points, Shockwave 2 damage +185% points, and Shockwave 3 damage +155% points.
Additional attack damage due to overheating +224% points
Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +210% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +170% points.
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 6 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 6.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 6 slots or higher increases its damage by 200% points and will generate Shockwave 4, which attacks up to 10 enemies for 400% damage 6 times.
details: Increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}>, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon-mastery.png} tip={Revolving Cannon Mastery (1st Job)}>, <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}>, and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}>

Capacity of your Ammo and Dynamo Gauge is increased once more<bp_Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> at 6 bars or higher will increase the %Damage of the skill and create a more powerful attack_>

primary.name: Shield Training II
primary.shortDesc: When hit, convert 50% of damage taken into a protective shield. 40% + 50 of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by 20% and Elemental Resistance by 20%, and Knockback Resistance by 60%.\nKnockback attack of Rocket Rush and Magnum Cannon damage +80% points.
details: Increases amount of damage converted
Increases Abnormal Status and %Elemental Resistance provided
Now increases %Knockback Resistance

Now increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/rocket-rush.png} tip={Rocket Rush (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-cannon.png} tip={Magnum Cannon (3rd Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Gauntlet Expert
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Critical Damage: +15%, Boss Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage and %Boss Damage

primary.name: Advanced Charge Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by 40%. Using a charge skill reloads 2 Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by 35%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore 35% of enemies' Defense, and damage taken is reduced by 15%.
details: Increases the amount of charge time decreased and amount of Ammo reloaded from 1 to 2
Increases amount of damage reduced after using charged skills
Now increases %Ignore DEF and %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Combo Training II
primary.shortDesc: Can be stacked up to 10 times. Duration: 30 sec. Final Damage and Critical Rate increased by 6% and 3% respectively per stack, Attack Speed increased by 1 for every 6 stacks, Skill Link Speed increased by 1 for every 5 stacks.\nPermanently increases Attack Power by 40
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack and now increases %Crit Rate per stack
Reduces amount of stacks required for Skill Link Speed increase
Now grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Aftershock Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the number of hits from the shockwaves created from <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/shotgun-punch.png} tip={Shotgun Punch (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Power Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/shotgun-punch.png} tip={Shotgun Punch (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/muzzle-flash.png} tip={Muzzle Flash (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/ballistic-hurricane.png} tip={Ballistic Hurricane (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Piercing Punch
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the %Ignore DEF of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/hammer-smash.png} tip={Hammer Smash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/shotgun-punch.png} tip={Shotgun Punch (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/muzzle-flash.png} tip={Muzzle Flash (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/ballistic-hurricane.png} tip={Ballistic Hurricane (4th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Improved Bunker Shockwave
hyperPassive.desc: Increases %Damage of the explosion after the initial hit

hyperPassive.name: Bunker Buster Explosion - Guard Bonus
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Guard bonus during Bunker Buster Explosion. Damage reduction rate follows the rates in Charge Mastery.

hyperPassive.name: Blast Shield Recovery
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recover 50% of the dissipating Blast Shield as HP.

hyperActive.name: Cannon Overdrive
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Duration: 35 sec. Increases damage for skills that use Ammo by 35%. Ammo auto-reload time decreased by 70%. The Dynamo Gauge Overheat duration for Bunker Buster Explosion is reduced to 1 second.\nCooldown : 120 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Increases the %Damage of skills that use Ammo and reduces the Ammo auto-reload time
details: While active, duration of the Dynamo Gauge Overheat is also reduced slightly

hyperActive.name: Hyper Magnum Punch
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 400, Attacks up to 15 enemies for 500% 15 times.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for 250% damage 8 times.
Can be enhanced up to 3 levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals 350%, 450%, 550% damage 8 times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by 5%, up to 50%.
Can be charged for up to 4 sec.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a powerful explosive punch in front of you
details: Depending on the duration the Skill Key is held, attack generates more shockwaves

While charging, the effects of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/charge-mastery.png} tip={Charge Mastery (2nd Job)}> are activated and you gain increased Abnormal Status Resistance
While charging, you gain increased %Final Damage whenever you are hit and cannot be stunned or knocked back

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Rocket Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 45 sec. Using your arm cannon while active triggers Revolving Cannon Boost, which uses special ammunition. Does not apply to 5th Job Advancement skills.\nMax Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 8, Enemy DEF Ignored: 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, your attacks trigger additional explosions
details: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> will be replaced while this skill is active
The explosion will consume 1 Ammo
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

fifthMain.name: Gatling Punch
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 12. Deals 935% damage 8 times consecutively for up to 4 sec while the key is held.\nGrants the Enhanced Guard effects of Charge Mastery and Combo Training with max stacks.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a rapid barrage of punches out in front of you
details: Activates effects of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/charge-mastery.png} tip={Charge Mastery (2nd Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/combo-training.png} tip={Combo Training (3rd Job)}> at max stack
While attacking, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance) and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Bullet Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Ammo Cost: 1 after reloading bullets upon casting
Can prepare for up to 5 sec, adds up to 5 bullets by using the Revolving Cannon
Launches an explosion in proportion to the number of bullets used after Charge when the key is released. Skill can be used again during Charge to launch an immediate explosion.
Invincible during preparation and Charge. Combo Training remains at the max level while casting skill.
Charge: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 3300%, Number of Attacks: 15
Explosion: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2640%, Number of Attacks: 15
All hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, prepare to charge forward and release a massive explosion behind you upon charging
details: Reloads Ammo and consumes 1 Ammo

While Skill Key is held, using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/revolving-cannon.png} tip={Revolving Cannon (1st Job)}> will consume Ammo (up to 5) to release a more powerful explosion<bp_You are invincible while preparing and charging_>
Pressing the Down Arrow Key when you release the Skill Key, you will attack in place instead of charging forward
Upon charging, pressing the Skill Key again will release the explosion immediately
Activates the effects of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/combo-training.png} tip={Combo Training (3rd Job)}> and remains at max stack while casting
Attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increased 100% Ignore DEF
Ignores Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Afterimage Shock
fifthMain.shortDesc: Active Effect: MP Cost: 1000. Upon successful hits with Arm Cannon's direct attacks and Bunker Buster Explosion, this skill creates afterimages that deal 5 additional attacks with 990% damage for 100 seconds. Afterimages can be created up to 49 time(s). Reoccurrence Cooldown: 0.1 second\n Passive Effect: While the active effect of Afterimage Shock's isn't active, upon successful hits with the Arm Cannon, this skill creates afterimages, which attack up to 10 enemies that have not been hit with 1100% damage up to 3 times. Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously. Reoccurrence Cooldown: 4 seconds\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, upon successful Gauntlet Revolver attacks or <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> explosions, an additional attack is dealt
details: [Passive]: While the active effect is inactive, successful Gauntlet Revolver attacks create a different additional attack that damages nearby enemies
Additional attack can only appear up to 49 times
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/magnum-punch.png} tip={Magnum Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/double-blast.png} tip={Double Blast (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Magnum Punch
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 985%, Number of Attacks: 3\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using HEXA Magnum Punch.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Double Blast
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 835%, Number of Attacks: 4\nRevolving Cannon triggers automatically while using HEXA Double Blast.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/resistance/blaster/bunker-buster-explosion.png} tip={Bunker Buster Explosion (1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Bunker Buster Explosion
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Direct Attack Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 8
Create a shockwave that attacks up to 10 enemies 6 times
Direct Attack damage and number of shockwaves depend on Dynamo Gauge
Burst Pile Bunker becomes available after using Bunker Buster Explosion 5 times
[3 Dynamo Gauge Bars] Direct Attack Damage: 520%
Shockwave 1 Damage: 670%
[4 Dynamo Gauge Bars] Direct Attack Damage 595%
Shockwave 2 Damage: 530% after shockwave 1
[5 Dynamo Gauge Bars] Direct Attack Damage: 740%
Shockwave 3 Damage: 540% after shockwave 1 and 2
[6 Dynamo Gauge Bars] Direct Attack Damage: 1160%
Shockwave 4 Damage: 730% after shockwave 1, 2, and 3
After use, you will Overheat for 7 sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion, and the Dynamo Gauge is depleted.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Final Destroyer
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Heat: 43
Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1550%, Number of Attacks: 14, Number of Explosions: 30
Cooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: HEXA Magnum Punch / Double Blast - 6th Job

meta: Blaster is a STR warrior class part of the Resistance class group. Blasters are known to be high-APM compared to other classes and have a big learning curve. Additionally, Blasters have two additional types of resources, Ammo and a Dynamo Gauge. Certain skills will consume Ammo to use and charge up your Dynamo Gauge to unleash powerful attacks
